thread.title: Aurora visible over western South Dakota Thursday night
thread.title_full: Aurora visible over western South Dakota Thursday night

author: Darsha Dodge Journal staff
title: Aurora visible over western South Dakota Thursday night
text: PHOTOS: Aurora visible over western South Dakota Thursday night The aurora borealis made a dramatic appearance Thursday night despite lingering clouds and smoke across much of western South Dakota. Journal Editor Darsha Dodge captured the show from Wasta.
